notifyme-digest-header-daily: here is a summary of activities on $1 for the last 24 hours
notifyme-digest-header-weekly: here is a summary of activities on $1 for the last week
notifyme-bucket-content-low-freq-desc: Page events that happen less frequently (create, delete, move...)
notifyme-bucket-content-high-freq-desc: Page events that happen more frequently (edits, comments... )
notifyme-bucket-personal-desc: Page events relevant only to you (assignments, reminders...)
notifyme-ui-dialog-set-editor-channels-h: All notifications will be delivered via Web interface
notifyme-ui-subscription-set-duplicate: You are already subscribed to this set of notifications
notifyme-ui-subscription-set-label: Configure notifications you are subscribed to
notifyme-ui-subscription-manager-type-ma: Choose which events you want to receive notifications for
notifyme-ui-email-frequency-instant-desc: Receive notifications as soon as they happen
notifyme-ui-email-frequency-daily-desc: Receive a daily summary of notifications
notifyme-ui-email-frequency-weekly-desc: Receive a weekly summary of notifications
notifyme-sample-data-source-provider-1: Group "Party planners" that you belong to is assigned to this page
notifyme-sample-data-source-provider-2: You are subscribed to category "Planning", which this page is a part of
notifyme-sample-data-content: Content of the email. To edit the formatting of the content, edit the pages mentioned above
notifyme-mail-template-output-header-sin: This is what an email notification for individual notifications looks like (with sample data). To edit the styling of the content of the email, edit this page. If you want to edit the wrapper for the email, see [[MediaWiki:Wrapper.mail|Email wrapper]]
notifyme-mail-template-output-header-dig: This is what an email summary notification will look like (with sample data). To edit the styling of the content of the email, edit this page. If you want to edit the wrapper for the email, see [[MediaWiki:Wrapper.mail|Email wrapper]]
notifyme-edit-mail-template-error-create: Creating new email templates is not possible
notifyme-edit-mail-template-error-edit: Cannot edit email template: Meta data missing
notifyme-ui-subscription-set-empty: You are not subscribed to any notifications yet
notifyme-schema-group-message: Header/summary for the group of notifications
notifyme-schema-group-count: Number of notifications in the group
notifyme-schema-links-primary: Whether the link is primary, boolean
notifyme-schema-agent: User that triggered the notification (or performed the action that triggered the notification)
notifyme-schema-agent-is-bot: Whether the agent is a bot
notifyme-schema-user-timestamp: Timestamp of the notification formatted according to the target user's preferences
notifyme-schema-target-user: User that the notification is targeted to
notifyme-schema-source-providers: List of source providers that triggered the notification (explains why user received the notification)
notifyme-schema-source-providers-link: Link to the place where user can change preferences (if applicable)
notifyme-mail-template-edit-help-colors: Following color variables are available. They will be automatically adjusted to the colors fo the wiki skin.
notifyme-mail-template-edit-help-int:
Internationalization messages can be used in the content via 
{{int:message-key}}
notifyme-mail-template-edit-help-logo:
To add the logo of your wiki, which is set in the skin, use 
<img src="{{logo}}" alt="Wiki logo" />
notifyme-schema-group-notifications: Notification objects that belong to the group
notifyme-subscriber-provider-mandatory-d: This notification is mandatory and cannot be unsubscribed from
notifyme-schema-link-intro: Message to be shown before the list of links. Availability of this field depends on the notification type
notifyme-sample-data-links-intro: Please visit the following links for more information
notifyme-schema-target-user-display-name: User real name (if available), otherwise username
notifyme-links-intro-edit: You can view the changes to the page directly via the following link
notifyme-mail-manage-notifications: Visit the following link to manage which notifications you receive
notifyme-event-page-linked-bot: Your page $1 was linked to page $2
notifyme-event-page-linked-group: Your page $1 has been linked to page $2 $3 times
notifyme-event-group-assigned: {{GENDER:$1|changed}} your user rights. You have been added to {{PLURAL:$2|the group "$3"|groups "$3"}}
notifyme-event-group-assigned-bot: Your user rights were changed. You have been added to {{PLURAL:$1|the group "$2"|groups "$2"}}
notifyme-event-group-removed: {{GENDER:$1|changed}} your user rights. You have been removed from {{PLURAL:$2|the group "$3"|groups "$3"}}
notifyme-event-group-removed-bot: Your user rights were changed. You have been removed from {{PLURAL:$1|the group "$2"|groups "$2"}}
notifyme-mail-template-output-header-wra: Wrapper for the emails. This style of email will be used for all emails sent from the wiki. Edit this to adapt the general styling of the email. If you need to edit the styling of the actual content, see mail content pages below:
notifyme-notification-tester-banner:
Use this page to trigger any notification registered on the system. Keep in mind that:
* Not all notifications support test-triggering. This depends on what resources are required to trigger them, and whether they can be mocked (see table).
* Some notifications rely on certain parameters being set (page, target user) and will not trigger without those being sent. In addition, some notification require a specific value for the parameters. For example, if you want to trigger a notification on a discussion page, you must specify a page in a discussion namespace in order for it to make sense.
* Sending of notifications will follow the same rules as if they were triggered by the actual event, so user preferences apply. This means that if the user is not subscribed to the event bucket, no notification will be triggered.
notifyme-notification-tester-field-bot: Send as bot user (some events use different messages based on whether actual user or a bot triggered them)
notifyme-notification-generic-links-intr: You can visit the page directly by using the following link
notifyme-notification-tester-event-info: Paste one of "event key"s from the table below
notifyme-mail-reception-reason: Why am I receiving this email?
notifyme-event-page-edit-revert-bot: Your edit on page $1 was reverted
notifyme-notification-center-navigation-: Tip: You can use the left and right arrow keys to navigate between the tabs in the tabs list.
notifyme-event-page-missing-desc: ''There is no description of this event yet''
notifyme-event-page-create-desc: A page has been created by another user
notifyme-event-page-delete-desc: A page has been deleted by another user
notifyme-event-page-move-desc: A page has been moved by another user
notifyme-event-page-edit-desc: A page has been edited by another user
